ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.model.Interfaces

Interface IAuthorStorage

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IReaderStorage

    public interface IAuthorStorage
extends IReaderStorage
    Service for publishing Stories or saving them locally while working on them.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int publishStory(Story story, java.util.Collection<StoryFragment> fragments)
      Publish a story to the web.
      boolean saveStory(Story story, java.util.Collection<StoryFragment> fragments)
      Save a story to local storage.
      boolean unpublishStory(long storyId)
      Remove a story from the web service.

      • Methods inherited from interface ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.model.Interfaces.IReaderStorage

        comment, deleteComment, deleteStoryLocally, getAllFragmentsForStory, getAllStories, getComments, getFragment, getStory, saveStoryLocally

    • Method Detail

      • publishStory

        int publishStory(Story story,
               java.util.Collection<StoryFragment> fragments)
        Publish a story to the web. May be an insert or update. Must be the author in case of an update.
        Parameters:
        story - the story
        fragments - the fragments for the story
        Returns:
        the ID of the story published

      • unpublishStory

        boolean unpublishStory(long storyId)
        Remove a story from the web service. Must be the author of the story
        Parameters:
        storyId - the story id
        Returns:
        True if story deleted, false otherwise

      • saveStory

        boolean saveStory(Story story,
                java.util.Collection<StoryFragment> fragments)
        Save a story to local storage. Does not publish the story
        Parameters:
        story - the story
        fragments - the fragments for the story
        Returns:
        True if saved, false otherwise
